original_text: You must not be ashamed of me and of my words. If you are, then the Son of Man will be ashamed of you. One day he will return and everyone will see his power. He will come with God's holy angels and he will have the bright glory of his Father God. He will be ashamed of you on that day, if you are ashamed of him now.’
korean_text: 누구든지 나와 내 말을 부끄러워하면 인자도 자기와 아버지와 거룩한 천사들의 영광으로 올 때에 그 사람을 부끄러워하리라

sentences.original_text: You must not be ashamed of me

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나의 말들도 부끄러워해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: then the Son of Man will be ashamed of you
and everyone will see his power
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 사람이 그의 권능을 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will come with God's holy angels
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 거룩한 천사들과 함께 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: and he will have the bright glory of his Father God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그의 아버지 하나님의 밝은 영광을 가질 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will be ashamed of you on that day
if you are ashamed of him now
